parameters: The crystal... You've really done it... haven't you?
That... that was the glue holding this Chateau together.

\!
Without it, my maids' brainwashing is nullified...
Normally, I'd... be tempted to curse my weakness, but...
Ha ha... Now, you're under my complete control.

\!
I can order you to do anything.
And now that I have you here... I believe I know precisely what I want you to do.

\!
\C[27][Take me with you on your adventure.]

\!
I may well regret this later, but with the crystal destroyed, I feel... the time is right.
I may well regret this later, but with the crystal destroyed, I feel... the time is right.
For now... \.I'll follow in Mother's footsteps.
I'll explain in a moment, Sofia...
\lsoffBad End "Chateau Maids" was added to the Journal!
\lsoffBad End "Madame Yterre" was added to the Journal!
\lsoffYou could destroy it, but Madame Yterre is too close...
Chip off a piece and see what happens...
Chip off a piece and see what happens...
\lsoffThere's a noticeable crack in the crystal, but you managed to get a piece off.
\lsoffThe crack in the crystal widened, but you managed to get another piece off.
\lsoffYou could destroy it, but there are too many maids around...
\lsoffYou could destroy it, but there are too many maids around...
\lsoff"HERE STANDS THE GREAT YTERRE CLAN CRYSTAL"
\lsoff"SHOULD ITS POWER FAIL, WOE BE TO THE ONE RESPONSIBLE"
C- Cleaning Mistress' statues with my tongue... it's such an honor, it makes me shiver~~ ♥♥
They need help with that in the Gallery...
They need help with that in the Gallery...

\!
I don't need outfits, though! I only need my maid uniform~! ♥
Mistress needs those clothes in the guest bedroom!
Mistress needs those clothes in the guest bedroom!
Oh, really~? Then I'd best get to it~! ♥
...Did you just step in my way, you worthless slut?
Remove yourself from my presence immediately.
I beg your pardon, but are you completely brainless?!
Very well. You have pushed your luck too far.

\!
Prepare yourself for an eternity of punishment...

Remove yourself from my presence immediately.
